channel.title: Muddy Creek Baptist Church

item.title: VBS 2023
item.description: This year MCBC will be doing Keepers of the Kingdom VBS from Answers in Genesis. Dates: June 19^th^–23^rd^ Time: 6:30pm–8:30pm We’ll have a family night dinner on Friday the 23^rd^. Bring mom and dad and enjoy food, fun, and games. Click here to learn more about Keepers of the Kingdom VBS.
